alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 12:55PM AKST until January 09 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of snow developed over Prince of Wales overnight. Whale Pass received around 3 inches this morning. This snow will persist through the day before the heavier snow arrives Saturday afternoon into Saturday evening. Snow amounts will be higher in the higher terrain of the road system and in northern communities. There is a chance of freezing rain. A change to all rain is expected early Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
